label: 位田
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Taxable rice fields given to those of the Fifth Rank (Go-i) and above, in amounts according to the rank (kurai ), ranging from 80 chō [ c. 196 acres ] to persons holding the First Order (Ip-pon) of Imperial Princes (Shinnō ), or the Senior First Rank (Shō-ichi-i) to 8 chō [ c.19. 6 acres ] to those of the Junior Fifth Rank (Jū-go-i ).　[五位、位、町、一品、親王、正一位、従五位]
